column4: so, i'm trying to install from a livecd.  i get the bootloading menu just fine, but when i attempt to actually do anything (such as install ubuntu), I get this: "loading isolinux: Disk error 80.  AX = 4200, Drive 9F"  Anyone know what this even means?
try checking the disk, from that menu.
try from a different CDrom drive, if you have one.
make sure you check the md5, and burn a cd at 4x (if you haven't, it might very well be bad burns)
